channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He thinks nothing of spending $40K on a new car’: My husband gives me the silent treatment. How can we agree on finances?
item.description: “I’m looking for a financial planner, marriage counselor and, possibly, a divorce attorney.”

item.title: Is it too late to add gold to your 401(k)?
item.description: It’s $4,000 an ounce, and everyone seems to want it

item.title: PepsiCo’s revenue grows, as higher prices offset a continued drop in beverage volumes
item.description: PepsiCo saw an earnings beat and an improved full-year outlook, even as beverage volumes in North America extended their long streak of declines.

item.title: Jobless claims — and layoffs — are still low. Unofficially, that is.
item.description: The weekly jobless claims report won’t resume until the government shutdown, which is on its ninth day, ends.

item.title: Private equity and private credit may fit your 401(k) retirement plan — but here’s what you need to know
item.description: Private credit is less risky than private equity. And be aware of the No. 1 rule for choosing a private-equity fund.

item.title: Hedge funds are still cautious. Why that could add more fuel to the rally
item.description: Stocks keep charging to record levels, and they could get another boost if a key group of investors turns more bullish.

item.title: Netflix is missing out on the market's latest run. Josh Brown thinks that could change soon
item.description: Josh and Sean give the set-up on Netflix ahead of earnings, which are often a volatile time for the stock.

item.title: DraftKings was hit hard on the prediction markets threat. One analyst believes the sell-off is overdone
item.description: Berenberg sees shares of DraftKings rallying 27% from their current valuation.

item.title: Here are Thursday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Oracle, Tesla, Amazon, Carvana, PNC, Cava, Broadcom, Microsoft & more
item.description: Here are Thursday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: This stock reporting earnings soon can't seem to shake the tariff overhang. How to hedge into the results
item.description: Mike Khouw breaks down the set-up in Hasbro.
